data.title: Stay away from this location!!
data.text:
We have eaten here many times, but for the past couple of months. We have gotten very bad customer service.  The last time we went service was really bad.  There were 4 other customers and we were the only ones who sat for over 2 hours before being served our meal.  When we received our food it was warm, not hot. 
Very bad service. The owner is from South Africa and is very nice, he needs to know how had his staff is.

data.title: Friday night dinner
data.text: We had the House Special pizza and split a small greek salad.  The salad was excellent, but they should give you two containers of the greek dressing. The pizza was excellent, all ingredients were fresh and cooked to perfection.  My husband even enjoyed a beer while our pizza finished cooking.

owner_response.author: MellowMgmt, Public Relations Manager at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you Lisa! We are glad you enjoyed your visit. Your server would be happy to split the dressing for you upon request.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Love it!
data.text: I have to admit I didn't realize Mellow Mushroom was an Atlanta thing before moving here. Now that I am here I just love that I get the chance to eat at a Mellow Mushroom all the time. Chicago native saying this is one of the best pizzas anywhere!!

owner_response.author: MellowMgmt, Public Relations Manager at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Love your Review, Kevin! Thank you for your business and for choosing Mellow Mushroom as your favorite pizza destination. We should feature you in our next campaign, we appreciate your loyalty!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Mellow Independence
data.text: Some places just should not be visited on a holiday. Being my first visit to this restaurant, I will give them a pass for assuming they had holiday staffing. It was certainly evident they had a lot of dinner time carry our orders on Independence Day. It appeared there were 2 perhaps 3 working that dinner session including the baker. Being I had just had pizza from another Mellow the day before, my wife and I opted to get salads and share a 10 wing order. The small chef salad was less than $5, so I was not expecting much. I was FAR from right. This was a VERY ample size chef salad filled with the normal toppings that made it a HUGE value. I could have stopped at the salad alone. The wings are baked, tasty, and seasoned well (I ordered medium buffalo style). The food made up for lack of staff ... and we will certainly go there again. The decor was fresh, glass tile, and comfortable with the seating surrounding the food prep area on 3 sides including counter service. I am ready to head back for more.

owner_response.author: MellowMgmt, Public Relations Manager at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you so much for your review! Welcome to the Mellow family!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Who is our waitress ?
data.text: We normally love mellow mushroom - granted we usually go to the Suwanee location not this one . We were seated promptly but different people stepped in for our waitress until she finally came by at the end of the meal. I sure hope she shared the tip as she did absolutely nothing. I am not sure if they were short on staff or if it was close to closing ( 8:30ish and they close at 10 but place was about half full ) but other people had to cover for her.  We had to ask the hostess for refills on drinks and approach someone at front to pay the bill. I only gave it a 3 because my husband loves the calzones and at the beginning the others were helpful.  I ordered the build your own salad. The greens and veggies were good but the pesto chicken was very dry. I get it on my pizza all the time so not sure if the pizza disguises the dryness or if it was just sitting for awhile that night.  Though we enjoy mellow mushroom - I would not go back to this location .

owner_response.author: MellowMgmt, Public Relations Manager at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you Deb for choosing to dine at our location. We are upset that we disappointed you and that should not have been the case. We have high standards for our food quality and service and anything less than that we need to know about. Our staff will be retrained in attentiveness. Please can you email us at medlockbridge@mellowmushroominfo.com so our GM can reach out to you personally. We hope that after we get a chance to talk to you, you will give us chance to earn your business back.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Love Mellow Mushroom but skip this location
data.text: This is the worst Mellow Mushroom I have been to and I have been to 4 others in the metro area and 1 in Charlotte. This one is dirty and the service wasn't that great and neither was the food. Love Mellow Mushrooms Gluten Free pizzas and will continue to eat there but not here. Cumming location or Suwanee is much better, better faster friendlier service, cleaner and much better food. You order at the counter and then the food is delivered to your table. I prefer the other locations where they come and take your order.

owner_response.author: MellowMgmt, Public Relations Manager at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your feedback. We appreciate your loyalty to the Mellow Mushroom Brand and we value your business always. This location is under new management and we hope you will contact us via email us at medlockbridge@mellowmushroominfo.com so we can reach out to you. We now have waitstaff for our customers. We hope you will give as a chance to earn your business back.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Delicious Lunch
data.text: Enjoyed my slice and lil' greek salad.  Fast, easy, and cheap.  This Mellow Mushroom always delivers great service and pies.

owner_response.author: MellowMgmt, Public Relations Manager at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Hey! Thank you for your patronage and for taking the time to review us! Happy to serve you always!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Mellow Mushroom
data.text: Some of the best pizza and sandwiches anywhere! Casual and very family friendly. You can expect a wait on any weekend, but worth it.

owner_response.author: MellowMgmt, Public Relations Manager at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Hey Perry, we wanted to say thank you for your business and your feedback! We look forward to serving you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Good pizza, friendly
data.text: I've had pizza here many many times. It's always good with fresh ingredients. People are nice who work there.  You can't go wrong with any Mellow Mushroom.

owner_response.author: MellowMgmt, Public Relations Manager at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you very much Mark for your business! We appreciate your continued loyalty!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: good staff
data.text: Mellow mushroom is always pretty good. Here and there u may run into to a not so good one either by wait staff or cooks. but this one was worth reviewing. Every single employee was helpful no matter if it was their table to wait on or not. Food was right and we seem to complicate our order. Beer was cold and fresh.

data.title: Never disappoints
data.text: Fast by Mellow Mushroom chain standards (for those who frequent other restaurants in the chain, you know that many folks take the word "mellow" very seriously), and the folks are friendly and smiling no matter how busy. Helps that the franchisee/owner is nearly always there, and the bloke works! I always get the mozzerella meatball ap, and the pizzas invariably are really good (wife and I love the Philopher's pie). Also - VERY VERY kid friendly location.

data.title: Very Nice
data.text: I love the Mellow Mushroom locations we have at home. However, I've never been to one quite like this. You order at the counter and they bring you the food, but you get the plates, silverware, drinks, napkins, etc. I actually kind of like taking care of myself. I'm assuming that it was the owner who came around checking to see how everyone's meal was. The food was just as good as it is at every other location. I will be back the next time I'm up there.

data.title: Good family pizza
data.text: I like the fact that my 9 year old grandson can have his personal small pizza.  I like the friendly staff.  The pizza is pretty good as well.

data.title: Very good pizza-the secret is in the dough!
data.text: I love this pizza!  The atmosphere is nothing to write home about, but it is the best, in my opinion, for take out.  I also like the greek salad!  My children also love this pizza!  Unfortunately, they do not deliver.

data.title: A must have!
data.text: Mellow Mushroom pizza is so good, that I would eat here everyday for lunch and dinner.  There are so many choices, it's hard to pick one, so go with a group of people and get a couple different pizza's to try.

data.title: Best in town
data.text: Mellow Mushroom has the best pizza in town! I love this place! They also have great sandwiches and calzones :) Fresh ingredients and savory sauce. If you are not a fan of pizza crust then don't even bother. That's the best part! Cooked to perfection every time. Worth the money.

data.title: A MUST!
data.text: Any time I see Mellow Mushroom Pizza I must partake! The crust is the perfect combination of doughy and crisp! Pizza perfection!

data.title: Very dirty
data.text:
We had to clean off our own table to begin with even though they were not busy and had 4-5 people working. The wall at the end of our table had obviously not been wiped in months and was attracting bugs.  They brought us the wrong pizza so we had to wait... enough said.  Drive a few miles south and there is a decent Mellow Mushroom at Holcomb Bridge and 141.
I almost never write anything negative but the length of time it takes to build up food on a wall like that shows this was not just a case of a one time lapse in their restaurant management.

data.title: Mixed Bag.  Good Pizza, Crazy Pricing
data.text: Properly prepared, Mellow Mushroom does the best pizza around.  This one is much better than the one that used to be up in Cumming.  However, they do crazy pricing (which makes it way overpriced) if you try to do a custom pizza with two different amounts of toppings on two separate sides.  Since that's what we normally order, we only eat here occasionally as that pricing makes the cost prohibitive for folks who want a pizza half with minimal kids friendly toppings--basically cheese-- and one half loaded with toppings.

data.title: Best pizza in Atlanta
data.text: MM is by far the best pizza available in Atlanta.  We sometimes eat in, and sometimes pick up and bring it home.  It is always delicious.
